alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Hale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 8:51AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chilton, northern Perry, northeastern Hale and Bibb Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 850 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eoline to near Camden. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Brent, Marion, Centreville, Jemison, Thorsby, Maplesville, Billingsley, Gap Of The Mountain, Parnell, West Centreville, Heiberger, Plecher, Lawley, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Low Gap, Mertz, Talladega National Forest and Eoline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
